attributes.name: AutoResize
attributes.description:
This mixin provides common functionality for automatically resizing view depending on the contents of the view. To make your view resize, you need to set the autoresize property to true, and let the mixin know whether it can resize the height of width.

In addition, autoResizeText is a required property for this mixin. It is already provided for Ember.TextField and Ember.TextArea.

fields.name: classNameBindings
fields.description: Add ember-auto-resize so additional styling can be applied indicating that the text field will automatically resize.

fields.name: autoresize
fields.description:
Whether the view using this mixin should autoresize it's contents. To enable autoresizing using the view's default resizing, set the attribute in your template.

{{input autoresize=true}}

fields.name: autoresizeElement
fields.description:
The DOM element that should be targeted for autoresizing. This defaults to the component's element, but may be used to autoresize a child element in cases where you may be using raw HTML elements.

This element must be observable to trigger proper resizing.

fields.name: shouldResizeWidth
fields.description: Whether the auto resize mixin should resize the width of this view.

fields.name: shouldResizeHeight
fields.description: Whether the auto resize mixin should resize the height of this view.

fields.name: maxWidth
fields.description: If set, this property will dictate how much the view is allowed to resize horizontally until it either falls back to scrolling or resizing vertically.

fields.name: maxHeight
fields.description: If set, this property dictates how much the view is allowed to resize vertically. If this is not set and the view is allowed to resize vertically, it will do so infinitely.

fields.name: autoResizeText
fields.description: A required property that should alias the property that should trigger recalculating the dimensions of the view.

fields.name: ignoreEscape
fields.description: Whether the autoResizeText has been sanitized and should be treated as HTML.

fields.name: significantWhitespace
fields.description: Whether whitespace should be treated as significant contrary to any styles on the view.

methods.name: scheduleMeasurement
methods.description: Schedule measuring the view's size. This happens automatically when the autoResizeText property changes.

methods.name: fontFamilyLoaded
methods.description: Detect when a font is loaded and resize the box.

methods.name: measureSize
methods.description: Measures the size of the text of the element.

methods.name: measuredSizeDidChange
methods.description: Alter the dimensions property of the view to conform to the measured size of the view.

methods.name: dimensionsDidChange
methods.description: Retiles the view at the end of the render queue.

accessors.name: dimensions
accessors.description: The current dimensions of the view being resized in terms of an object hash that includes a width and height property.
